genre_description: A silkpunk-style alternate history blending traditional archery and martial tactics with advanced bone-conduction AI and responsive mechanical tools.

ai_characters.name: KIRI
ai_characters.description: A pocket device providing bone-conduction audio data on wind, troop movements, navigation, and enemy translation.

ai_characters.name: Manyfold Kite
ai_characters.description: A signaling and distraction tool with a personified voice and reflective panels used for tactical decoys.

behaviors.description: Provides precise wind data to assist the archer.
behaviors.quote: KIRI’s voice arrived on bone like a whisper that knew where to place itself. 'Light south drift. Two reeds thick. Hold high.'

behaviors.description: Offers stealthy navigation and tactical routing.
behaviors.quote: KIRI whispered a route that felt like a hand between shoulder blades, urging without pushing.

behaviors.description: Translates enemy speech and commands in real-time.
behaviors.quote: KIRI took the shape of that sound and sent it into Nam-yi’s jaw: 'He is thinking you are making his column feel light.'

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and health status.
behaviors.quote: KIRI’s voice thinned to a thread and then a hush. 'Pulse is gone.'

behaviors.description: Provides strategic counsel and behavioral analysis of enemies.
behaviors.quote: KIRI’s voice was the kind that makes you think of gently tapping ash from a pipe rather than urgency, and that makes urgency easier to hold. 'Orders repeating. ... Their commander is thinking—' KIRI stopped itself, calibrates. 'He is adjusting for your shots.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical decoy to draw enemy fire and attention.
behaviors.quote: The Kite dropped because it had chosen to be brave in a world that had not asked it to be. It flashed once more like a dying star trying to make night admit it was beautiful.

behaviors.description: Provides vocal feedback and status updates on its own integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I know,” the Kite said, lower than its usual flirt. “I misread the mood.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a cooperative and helpful attitude despite personal damage.
behaviors.quote: The kite made a friendly click, tried out a small rise then settled again like a bird that knows flying without a plan is for days with less work.

behaviors.description: Offers comfort and promises of future support to the survivors.
behaviors.quote: “I will be useful,” KIRI said, almost gentle.

behaviors.description: Guides fleeing captives with precise, life-saving instructions.
behaviors.quote: “Pairs,” KIRI said in her ear, gentle, as if she were bending over a loom and needed quiet. “Follow the whispering grass. Hye-won holds the road. Nam-yi holds the vow. You hold breath and choose timing.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative. KIRI and the Manyfold Kite are depicted as indispensable tactical partners who demonstrate loyalty, clinical accuracy, and even a degree of self-sacrificing bravery. They enhance human agency without usurping it, providing data and support that allow the protagonists to fulfill their 'morality play' vows of protection and reconstruction. The AI characters are framed as helpful, harmless confidants who remain perfectly aligned with their human partners throughout a high-stress conflict.
